metadata.title: DEPRECATED: ELSA-2012-0884 -- openssh security, bug fix, and enhancement update (low)
metadata.description:
[5.3p1-81] - fixes in openssh-5.3p1-required-authentications.patch (#657378)
[5.3p1-79] - fix forward on non-localhost ports with IPv6 (#732955)
[5.3p1-78] - clear SELinux exec context before exec passwd (#814691)
[5.3p1-77] - prevent post-auth resource exhaustion (#809938)
[5.3p1-76] - don't escape backslah in a banner (#809619)
[5.3p1-75] - fix various issues in openssh-5.3p1-required-authentications.patch (#805901)
[5.3p1-74] - fix out-of-memory killer patch (#744236)
[5.3p1-73] - remove openssh-4.3p2-no-v6only.patch (#732955) - adjust Linux out-of-memory killer (#744236) - fix sshd init script - check existence of crypto (#797384) - add RequiredAuthentications[12] (#657378) - run privsep slave process as the users SELinux context (#798241)
[5.3p1-72] - drop CAVS test driver (#782091)
[5.3p1-71] - enable aes-ctr ciphers use the EVP engines from OpenSSL such as the AES-NI (#756929) - add CAVS test driver for the aes-ctr ciphers (#782091)
